sentence.Network_en: "Why don't we do something?" Davis asked plaintively.
sentence.Network_cn: 戴维斯悲伤地问道：“我们难道就不能做点什么吗？”

sentence.Network_en: The last note of the song rang out plaintively.
sentence.Network_cn: 歌曲最后道出了离别的哀怨.

sentence.Network_en: Birds cry plaintively before they die, men speak kindly in the presence of death.
sentence.Network_cn: 鸟之将死,其鸣也哀;人之将死, 其言也善.

entry.def: A plaintive sound or voice sounds sad.

example.ex: They lay on the firm sands, listening to the plaintive cry of the seagulls...
example.tran: 他们躺在硬实的沙地上，听着海鸥的哀鸣。

example.ex: Her voice was small and plaintive.

sentences.sentence: "the last note of the song rang out plaintively"

auth_sentence.content: "Look, I have kids, too," the Vice-President said plaintively.
